full_text: This pattern is interchangeable with all types of needles and yarn, as long as the final dimensions are 6 inches across by 3 inches tall. The pattern provided is what we have been using in the office. Once your brick is finished, mail it into: Secular Coalition for America 1012 14th St. NW Suite 205 Washington, DC 20005 https://www.facebook.com/SecularCoalition/photos/gm.65234...
name: Ravelry: Hobby Lobby Made Me #KnitABrick pattern by Secular Coalition for America
